## OrientedBox3.(constructor)

Creates a new `OrientedBox3` with the given position, orientation and extents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(position: Vector3, rotationMatrix: Matrix4, extents: Vector3);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | Vector3 | The position of the center of the <code>OrientedBox3</code>. |
|  rotationMatrix | Matrix4 | The rotation of the <code>OrientedBox3</code>. |
|  extents | Vector3 | The extents of the <code>OrientedBox3</code>. |
